verses.roman:
eta bali' prabhu tāṅre āliṅgana kailā
prabhura kṛpāte kṛṣṇa-preme matta hailā

synonyms: eta bali'-saying this; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—Raghunātha Bhaṭṭa; āliṅgana kailā—embraced; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṛpāte—by the mercy; kṛṣṇa-preme—in love of Kṛṣṇa; matta hailā—became enlivened.
translation: After saying this, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu embraced Raghunātha Bhaṭṭa, and by the Lord's mercy Raghunātha was enlivened with ecstatic love for Kṛṣṇa.
